name: Takume
description:
Takume is a very short (around 5 min.) and linear atmospheric and dramatic adventure game. A mystic story about identity, dreaming and dealing with past events.

Works with Mouse, Keyboard and Gamepad.

Game starts in Fullscreen. You can hold Alt pressed while starting to open the Standard Unity Launcher where you can set a custom resolution and Windowed state. (Windows: Double Click without Alt and then immediately hold Alt pressed)

Update 1.1: (only Win, Mac, Linux, not Android)
- Added Spanish and German Translation
- Game state is automatically saved
- Framework update

Credits:

talecrafter - Art, Code

Lara Kaaa - Writing, German Translation

James Dean - Audio

Chris Early - Font, Logo

Maximiliano Vaccaro - Spanish Translation

Audio powered by Fabric

Content Creators:

You can make videos / live streaming of this in any form you want, including monetization.
